A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Dreadful. Thought it was going to be bad; it surprised me by being AWFUL.

Dumb-as-a-box-of-hammers plot\, inopportune humor abound\, old characters get offed unceremoniously and new ones are a whole new shade of bad. This isn't Star Wars. I'd say it was like Spaceballs II\, but it wasn't even that funny.

Thumbs WAY down. Good jarb Disney. You did what nobody else could: you actually ruined Star Wars.
